fields.name: equipment
fields.description:
Retrieve all industrial equipment in the system.
Returns a list of all registered machinery with their current status and specifications.

fields.name: equipmentById
fields.description:
Get a specific piece of equipment by its unique identifier.
Returns detailed information about the equipment including specifications, status, and maintenance history.

fields.name: facilities
fields.description:
Retrieve all manufacturing facilities in the system.
Returns a list of facilities with their locations, capacities, and operational status.

fields.name: facilityById
fields.description:
Get a specific facility by its unique identifier.
Returns detailed information about the facility including equipment inventory and operational metrics.

fields.name: maintenanceRecords
fields.description:
Retrieve all maintenance records in the system.
Returns a comprehensive list of maintenance activities, both scheduled and completed.

fields.name: maintenanceRecordsByEquipment
fields.description:
Get maintenance records for a specific piece of equipment.
Returns the complete maintenance history for the specified equipment.

fields.name: operationalMetrics
fields.description:
Retrieve all operational metrics and performance data.
Returns key performance indicators, efficiency metrics, and operational statistics.

fields.name: facilityStatus
fields.description:
Get real-time status of all equipment in a specific facility.
Returns current operational status, alerts, and performance indicators.

fields.name: createEquipment
fields.description:
Register a new piece of industrial equipment in the system.
Creates a new equipment record with specifications, location, and initial status.

fields.name: updateEquipment
fields.description:
Update existing equipment information.
Modifies equipment specifications, status, or location information.

fields.name: deleteEquipment
fields.description:
Remove equipment from the system.
Deactivates the equipment record and removes it from active operations.

fields.name: createFacility
fields.description:
Create a new manufacturing facility.
Establishes a new facility with location, capacity, and operational parameters.

fields.name: updateFacility
fields.description:
Update facility information.
Modifies facility details, capacity, or operational parameters.

fields.name: deleteFacility
fields.description:
Remove a facility from the system.
Deactivates the facility and removes it from operational management.

fields.name: scheduleMaintenance
fields.description:
Schedule a new maintenance activity.
Creates a maintenance record with scheduled date, type, and assigned personnel.

fields.name: updateMaintenanceRecord
fields.description:
Update maintenance record status.
Modifies maintenance status, completion details, or reschedules the activity.

fields.name: completeMaintenance
fields.description:
Complete a maintenance activity.
Marks a maintenance record as completed with completion details and notes.

fields.name: recordOperationalMetric
fields.description:
Record operational metrics.
Logs performance data, efficiency measurements, and operational statistics.

fields.name: updateEquipmentStatus
fields.description:
Update equipment operational status.
Changes equipment status (running, stopped, maintenance, error) with optional notes.

types.name: AlertSeverity
types.description:
Severity levels for equipment alerts.
Indicates the urgency and impact of equipment issues.

types.name: AlertType
types.description:
Types of equipment alerts and issues.
Categorizes different types of equipment problems and warnings.

types.name: Boolean
types.description: The `Boolean` scalar type represents `true` or `false`.

types.name: CompleteMaintenanceInput
types.description:
Input for completing maintenance activities.
Contains information needed to mark maintenance as completed.

types.name: ContactInfo
types.description:
Represents contact information for facilities.
Contains communication details for facility management.

fields.name: phone
fields.description: Primary contact phone number

fields.name: email
fields.description: Email address for facility communications

fields.name: emergencyPhone
fields.description: Emergency contact phone number

fields.name: managerContact
fields.description: Facility manager contact information

types.name: ContactInfoInput
types.description:
Input for contact information.
Contains communication details for facilities.

types.name: CreateEquipmentInput
types.description:
Input for creating new industrial equipment.
Contains all necessary information to register equipment in the system.

inputFields.name: facilityId
inputFields.description: ID of the facility where equipment is located

types.name: CreateFacilityInput
types.description:
Input for creating new manufacturing facilities.
Contains information needed to establish a new facility.

types.name: Dimensions
types.description:
Represents equipment dimensions.
Contains length, width, and height measurements.

fields.name: length
fields.description: Length in meters

fields.name: width
fields.description: Width in meters

fields.name: height
fields.description: Height in meters

types.name: DimensionsInput
types.description:
Input for equipment dimensions.
Contains length, width, and height measurements.

types.name: ElectricalSpecs
types.description:
Represents electrical specifications for equipment.
Contains voltage, current, and power requirements.

fields.name: voltage
fields.description: Operating voltage in volts

fields.name: current
fields.description: Operating current in amperes

fields.name: powerFactor
fields.description: Power factor

fields.name: frequency
fields.description: Frequency in hertz

types.name: ElectricalSpecsInput
types.description:
Input for electrical specifications.
Contains voltage, current, and power requirements.

types.name: Equipment
types.description:
Represents a piece of industrial equipment in the manufacturing system.
Contains comprehensive information about machinery specifications, status, and operational data.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the equipment

fields.name: name
fields.description: Human-readable name of the equipment

fields.name: description
fields.description: Detailed description of the equipment and its purpose

fields.name: manufacturer
fields.description: Manufacturer of the equipment

fields.name: model
fields.description: Model number or designation of the equipment

fields.name: serialNumber
fields.description: Serial number for unique identification

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type or category of equipment (e.g., CNC_MILL, CONVEYOR_BELT, ROBOTIC_ARM)

fields.name: status
fields.description: Current operational status of the equipment

fields.name: facility
fields.description: Facility where the equipment is located

fields.name: specifications
fields.description: Specifications and technical parameters of the equipment

fields.name: installedAt
fields.description: Installation date of the equipment

fields.name: lastMaintenanceAt
fields.description: Last maintenance date

fields.name: nextMaintenanceAt
fields.description: Next scheduled maintenance date

fields.name: efficiency
fields.description: Current operational efficiency percentage (0-100)

fields.name: totalOperatingHours
fields.description: Total operating hours since installation

fields.name: maintenanceRecords
fields.description: Maintenance records for this equipment

fields.name: alerts
fields.description: Current alerts or issues with the equipment

types.name: EquipmentAlert
types.description:
Represents an alert or issue with equipment.
Tracks equipment problems, warnings, and maintenance needs.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the alert

fields.name: equipment
fields.description: Equipment this alert relates to

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of alert or issue

fields.name: severity
fields.description: Severity level of the alert

fields.name: description
fields.description: Description of the alert or issue

fields.name: generatedAt
fields.description: Date and time when the alert was generated

fields.name: acknowledged
fields.description: Whether the alert has been acknowledged

fields.name: acknowledgedAt
fields.description: Date when the alert was acknowledged

fields.name: acknowledgedBy
fields.description: Person who acknowledged the alert

fields.name: resolved
fields.description: Resolution status of the alert

fields.name: resolvedAt
fields.description: Date when the alert was resolved

types.name: EquipmentSpecifications
types.description:
Represents equipment specifications and technical parameters.
Contains detailed technical information about machinery capabilities.

fields.name: powerConsumption
fields.description: Power consumption in kilowatts

fields.name: maxSpeed
fields.description: Maximum operating speed or capacity

fields.name: operatingTemperature
fields.description: Operating temperature range in Celsius

fields.name: weight
fields.description: Weight of the equipment in kilograms

fields.name: dimensions
fields.description: Dimensions of the equipment (length x width x height)

fields.name: electricalSpecs
fields.description: Required voltage and electrical specifications

fields.name: environmentalRequirements
fields.description: Environmental requirements (humidity, dust, etc.)

fields.name: certifications
fields.description: Safety certifications and compliance standards

types.name: EquipmentSpecificationsInput
types.description:
Input for equipment specifications.
Contains technical parameters and capabilities.

types.name: EquipmentStatus
types.description:
Operational status of industrial equipment.
Indicates the current state of equipment operation.

types.name: EquipmentType
types.description:
Types of industrial equipment in the manufacturing system.
Categorizes equipment by function and operational characteristics.

types.name: Facility
types.description:
Represents a manufacturing facility containing industrial equipment.
Manages facility-level operations, capacity, and equipment inventory.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the facility

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the manufacturing facility

fields.name: address
fields.description: Physical address of the facility

fields.name: location
fields.description: Geographic location coordinates

fields.name: capacity
fields.description: Total production capacity of the facility

fields.name: utilization
fields.description: Current utilization percentage (0-100)

fields.name: status
fields.description: Operational status of the facility

fields.name: operationalSince
fields.description: Date when the facility became operational

fields.name: equipment
fields.description: Equipment inventory in this facility

fields.name: manager
fields.description: Facility manager responsible for operations

fields.name: contactInfo
fields.description: Contact information for the facility

types.name: FacilityOperationalStatus
types.description:
Operational status of manufacturing facilities.
Indicates the current operational state of a facility.

types.name: FacilityStatus
types.description:
Represents the current status of a manufacturing facility.
Provides real-time operational information and alerts.

fields.name: facility
fields.description: Facility this status relates to

fields.name: status
fields.description: Current operational status

fields.name: equipmentRunning
fields.description: Number of equipment units currently running

fields.name: equipmentStopped
fields.description: Number of equipment units currently stopped

fields.name: equipmentInMaintenance
fields.description: Number of equipment units in maintenance

fields.name: activeAlerts
fields.description: Number of active alerts in the facility

fields.name: productionRate
fields.description: Current production rate (units per hour)

fields.name: efficiency
fields.description: Overall facility efficiency percentage

fields.name: lastUpdated
fields.description: Last updated timestamp

types.name: Float
types.description: The `Float` scalar type represents signed double-precision fractional values as specified by [IEEE 754](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_floating_point).

types.name: ID
types.description: The `ID` scalar type represents a unique identifier, often used to refetch an object or as key for a cache. The ID type appears in a JSON response as a String; however, it is not intended to be human-readable. When expected as an input type, any string (such as "4") or integer (such as 4) input value will be accepted as an ID.

types.name: Int
types.description: The `Int` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.

types.name: Location
types.description:
Represents geographic location coordinates.
Used for facility and equipment location tracking.

fields.name: latitude
fields.description: Latitude coordinate

fields.name: longitude
fields.description: Longitude coordinate

fields.name: altitude
fields.description: Altitude above sea level in meters

types.name: LocationInput
types.description:
Input for geographic location.
Contains latitude, longitude, and optional altitude.

inputFields.name: altitude
inputFields.description: Altitude above sea level in meters

types.name: MaintenancePriority
types.description:
Priority levels for maintenance activities.
Indicates the urgency and importance of maintenance work.

types.name: MaintenanceRecord
types.description:
Represents a maintenance record for industrial equipment.
Tracks maintenance activities, schedules, and completion status.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the maintenance record

fields.name: equipment
fields.description: Equipment being maintained

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of maintenance activity

fields.name: priority
fields.description: Priority level of the maintenance

fields.name: scheduledDate
fields.description: Scheduled date for the maintenance

fields.name: completedDate
fields.description: Actual completion date (null if not completed)

fields.name: status
fields.description: Status of the maintenance activity

fields.name: description
fields.description: Description of the maintenance work to be performed

fields.name: assignedTechnician
fields.description: Technician assigned to perform the maintenance

fields.name: estimatedDuration
fields.description: Estimated duration in hours

fields.name: actualDuration
fields.description: Actual duration in hours (null if not completed)

fields.name: requiredParts
fields.description: Parts or materials required for the maintenance

fields.name: cost
fields.description: Cost of the maintenance activity

fields.name: notes
fields.description: Notes or observations from the maintenance

types.name: MaintenanceStatus
types.description:
Status of maintenance activities.
Tracks the progress and completion of maintenance work.

types.name: MaintenanceType
types.description:
Types of maintenance activities for industrial equipment.
Categorizes different types of maintenance work.

types.name: MetricType
types.description:
Types of operational metrics and performance indicators.
Categorizes different types of performance measurements.

types.name: Mutation
types.description:
Root mutation type for modifying industrial machinery data.
Provides capabilities to add, update, and manage equipment, facilities, and maintenance operations.

fields.description:
Register a new piece of industrial equipment in the system.
Creates a new equipment record with specifications, location, and initial status.

fields.name: updateEquipment
fields.description:
Update existing equipment information.
Modifies equipment specifications, status, or location information.

fields.name: deleteEquipment
fields.description:
Remove equipment from the system.
Deactivates the equipment record and removes it from active operations.

fields.name: createFacility
fields.description:
Create a new manufacturing facility.
Establishes a new facility with location, capacity, and operational parameters.

fields.name: updateFacility
fields.description:
Update facility information.
Modifies facility details, capacity, or operational parameters.

fields.name: deleteFacility
fields.description:
Remove a facility from the system.
Deactivates the facility and removes it from operational management.

fields.name: scheduleMaintenance
fields.description:
Schedule a new maintenance activity.
Creates a maintenance record with scheduled date, type, and assigned personnel.

fields.name: updateMaintenanceRecord
fields.description:
Update maintenance record status.
Modifies maintenance status, completion details, or reschedules the activity.

fields.name: completeMaintenance
fields.description:
Complete a maintenance activity.
Marks a maintenance record as completed with completion details and notes.

fields.name: recordOperationalMetric
fields.description:
Record operational metrics.
Logs performance data, efficiency measurements, and operational statistics.

fields.name: updateEquipmentStatus
fields.description:
Update equipment operational status.
Changes equipment status (running, stopped, maintenance, error) with optional notes.

types.name: OperationalMetric
types.description:
Represents operational metrics and performance data.
Tracks key performance indicators and efficiency measurements.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the metric record

fields.name: equipment
fields.description: Equipment this metric relates to

fields.name: metricType
fields.description: Type of metric being measured

fields.name: value
fields.description: Value of the metric

fields.name: unit
fields.description: Unit of measurement for the metric

fields.name: recordedAt
fields.description: Date and time when the metric was recorded

fields.name: targetValue
fields.description: Target or expected value for this metric

fields.name: meetsTarget
fields.description: Whether the metric meets the target threshold

fields.name: notes
fields.description: Additional context or notes about the metric

types.name: Query
types.description:
Root query type for retrieving industrial machinery data.
Provides access to equipment, facilities, maintenance records, and operational metrics.

fields.name: equipment
fields.description:
Retrieve all industrial equipment in the system.
Returns a list of all registered machinery with their current status and specifications.

fields.name: equipmentById
fields.description:
Get a specific piece of equipment by its unique identifier.
Returns detailed information about the equipment including specifications, status, and maintenance history.

fields.name: facilities
fields.description:
Retrieve all manufacturing facilities in the system.
Returns a list of facilities with their locations, capacities, and operational status.

fields.name: facilityById
fields.description:
Get a specific facility by its unique identifier.
Returns detailed information about the facility including equipment inventory and operational metrics.

fields.name: maintenanceRecords
fields.description:
Retrieve all maintenance records in the system.
Returns a comprehensive list of maintenance activities, both scheduled and completed.

fields.name: maintenanceRecordsByEquipment
fields.description:
Get maintenance records for a specific piece of equipment.
Returns the complete maintenance history for the specified equipment.

fields.name: operationalMetrics
fields.description:
Retrieve all operational metrics and performance data.
Returns key performance indicators, efficiency metrics, and operational statistics.

fields.name: facilityStatus
fields.description:
Get real-time status of all equipment in a specific facility.
Returns current operational status, alerts, and performance indicators.

types.name: RecordOperationalMetricInput
types.description:
Input for recording operational metrics.
Contains performance data and measurements.

inputFields.name: equipmentId
inputFields.description: ID of equipment this metric relates to

types.name: ScheduleMaintenanceInput
types.description:
Input for scheduling maintenance activities.
Contains information needed to create a maintenance record.

inputFields.name: equipmentId
inputFields.description: ID of equipment to be maintained

types.name: String
types.description: The `String`scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.

types.name: TemperatureRange
types.description:
Represents temperature range specifications.
Defines minimum and maximum operating temperatures.

fields.name: min
fields.description: Minimum operating temperature in Celsius

fields.name: max
fields.description: Maximum operating temperature in Celsius

types.name: TemperatureRangeInput
types.description:
Input for temperature range.
Defines minimum and maximum operating temperatures.

types.name: UpdateEquipmentInput
types.description:
Input for updating existing equipment.
Allows modification of equipment information and specifications.

types.name: UpdateFacilityInput
types.description:
Input for updating facility information.
Allows modification of facility details and parameters.

types.name: UpdateMaintenanceRecordInput
types.description:
Input for updating maintenance records.
Allows modification of maintenance details and status.

types.name: __Directive
types.description:
A Directive provides a way to describe alternate runtime execution and type validation behavior in a GraphQL document.

In some cases, you need to provide options to alter GraphQL's execution behavior in ways field arguments will not suffice, such as conditionally including or skipping a field. Directives provide this by describing additional information to the executor.

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: A Directive can be adjacent to many parts of the GraphQL language, a __DirectiveLocation describes one such possible adjacencies.

types.name: __EnumValue
types.description: One possible value for a given Enum. Enum values are unique values, not a placeholder for a string or numeric value. However an Enum value is returned in a JSON response as a string.

types.name: __Field
types.description: Object and Interface types are described by a list of Fields, each of which has a name, potentially a list of arguments, and a return type.

types.name: __InputValue
types.description: Arguments provided to Fields or Directives and the input fields of an InputObject are represented as Input Values which describe their type and optionally a default value.

fields.name: defaultValue
fields.description: A GraphQL-formatted string representing the default value for this input value.

types.name: __Schema
types.description: A GraphQL Schema defines the capabilities of a GraphQL server. It exposes all available types and directives on the server, as well as the entry points for query, mutation, and subscription operations.

fields.name: types
fields.description: A list of all types supported by this server.

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The type that query operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: If this server supports mutation, the type that mutation operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: If this server support subscription, the type that subscription operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: directives
fields.description: A list of all directives supported by this server.

types.name: __Type
types.description:
The fundamental unit of any GraphQL Schema is the type. There are many kinds of types in GraphQL as represented by the `__TypeKind` enum.

Depending on the kind of a type, certain fields describe information about that type. Scalar types provide no information beyond a name, description and optional `specifiedByURL`, while Enum types provide their values. Object and Interface types provide the fields they describe. Abstract types, Union and Interface, provide the Object types possible at runtime. List and NonNull types compose other types.

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given `__Type` is.
